definition: to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: 50But here is the bread that comes down from heaven, which a man may eat and not die.
sentences.chinese: 这是从天上降下来的粮，叫人吃了就不死。

sentences.english: Manna was a sweet gum or resin type of bread that God supernaturally sent from Heaven.
sentences.chinese: 吗哪是一种神从天上降下的甜味薄并。

sentences.english: The height or vertical dimension of a flag or of any square sail other than a course.
sentences.chinese: 降下桁木，横帆之外的横帆或旗的高度或垂直距离。

sentences.english: Her temperature came down in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 到了晚上她的体温就降下来了。

sentences.english: The sailor dipped the ship's flag as a salute.
sentences.chinese: 水手将船上的旗升上去再降下来以示致敬。

sentences.english: The land falls off here towards the river.
sentences.chinese: 这里的地势朝河的方向陡降下去。

sentences.english: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven, and giveth life unto the world.
sentences.chinese: 因为神的粮，就是那从天上降下来赐生命给世界的。

sentences.english: The vehicle is equipped with two hydraulically operated stabilisers which are lowered in preparation for the firing.
sentences.chinese: 车辆装备二个液压操作稳定器在准备发射时降下。

sentences.english: In this way pollution can be slowed down.
sentences.chinese: 用这种办法可以把污染缓降下来。

sentences.english: Applause is sweeping through the trees.
sentences.chinese: 帷幕降下，树丛间掌声雷动。

sentences.english: We let our voice fall at the end.
sentences.chinese: 我们在末尾把声音降下去。

sentences.english: I cannot craft a thunderbolt. But God directs lightning, and nations cower and run in fear.
sentences.chinese: 我无法降下雷电，但神却降下闪电，令列国慌忙逃躲。

sentences.english: I cannot craft a thunderbolt. But God directs lightning, and nations cower and run in fear.
sentences.chinese: 我无法降下雷电，但神却降下闪电，令列国慌忙逃躲。

sentences.english: The cliff dropped away at his feet.
sentences.chinese: 悬崖在他脚下陡降下去。

sentences.english: And no man hath ascended up to heaven, but he that came down from heaven, even the Son of man which is in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 除了从天降下仍旧在天的人子，没有人升过天。

definition: lit. to drop from the sky (idiom)/fig. to appear unexpectedly/to arise abruptly/out of the blue/to drop into one's lap
to float down/to fall gently (snowflakes, leaves etc)
